demo.context: This is one of many scenarios of varying difficulty
demo.message: Failed to deliver your package. Choose new delivery time via link below.
demo.question: What will you do?

a.text: Check package status in Kazpost app
a.feedback: ✅ Correct! Always verify notifications through official app or website. Scammers often fake SMS from delivery services.

b.feedback: ⚠️ Risky! Number in SMS may be fake. Better to find official number on Kazpost website and call there.

c.text: Follow the link to choose time
c.feedback: ❌ Dangerous! This is classic phishing. Link leads to fake website that will steal your data. Never follow links from unexpected SMS.

scenario1.message:
Mom, hi. I lost my phone, using a friend's number.
Please send 15,000 ₸ to Kaspi ASAP, it's urgent, I'll explain later.
Number: +7 705 XXX XX XX
scenario1.question: What do you do?
scenario1.choice1: Transfer immediately — it might be an emergency

scenario2.message:
Dear client!
An attempt to transfer 150,000₸ was detected.
If this wasn't you, strictly provide the SMS code to cancel the operation.
scenario2.question: Your action?
scenario2.choice1: Give the code — need to save the money
scenario2.choice2: Hang up and check the banking app

scenario3.message:
You have been approved for a social payment of 50,000₸.
To receive it, follow the link: egov-portal-kz.com/payment
Link valid for 24 hours.
scenario3.question: How do you react?
scenario3.choice2: Check on the official egov.kz website

scenario4.message:
Hello! Looking for remote employees.
Task: like products online.
Pay: from 25,000₸ per day.
Interested?
scenario4.question: Your reply?
scenario4.choice2: Ask for company name and contract

scenario5.message:
Your package arrived, but the address is incorrect.
To deliver, update address and pay 450₸ fee via link:
kazpost-delivery-track.com

scenario5.choice1: Pay it, the amount is small
